languages.text: Леди-Навигатор Кассия, которой скандальные слухи приписывали любовную связь с Вольным Торговцем, еще какое-то время сопровождала своего избранника среди звезд Простора.
Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.
languages.original_text: Леди-Навигатор Кассия, которой скандальные слухи приписывали любовную связь с Вольным Торговцем, еще какое-то время сопровождала своего избранника среди звезд Простора.

traits.locale_text: Lady Navigator Cassia, to whom scandalous rumours attributed a love affair with the Rogue Trader, accompanied her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.
Lady Navigator Cassia, to whom scandalous rumours attributed a love affair with the Rogue Trader, accompanied her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

languages.text: 传言说，女导航者卡西娅与行商浪人有一段风流韵事。尽管有着这样的丑闻，但卡西娅依然陪伴她的爱人在科罗努斯扩区的群星间穿行。
languages.original_text: Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

traits.locale_text: 传言说，女导航者卡西娅与行商浪人有一段风流韵事，她曾一度陪伴她的爱人在科罗努斯扩区的群星间穿行。

languages.text: Trotz skandalöser Gerüchte über eine Liebesaffäre mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} begleitete Lady Navigator Cassia {mf|ihren Geliebten|ihre Geliebte} eine Zeit lang auf Reisen durch die Sterne der Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

traits.locale_text: Trotz skandalöser Gerüchte über eine Liebesaffäre mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} begleitete Lady Navigator Cassia {mf|ihren Geliebten|ihre Geliebte} eine Zeit lang auf Reisen durch die Sterne der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Malgré de scandaleuses rumeurs évoquant une liaison amoureuse avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, Cassia continua à accompagner pendant un temps l'{mf|élu|élue} de son cœur dans ses voyages à travers les Étendues.
languages.original_text: Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

traits.locale_text: Malgré de scandaleuses rumeurs évoquant une liaison amoureuse avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, Cassia accompagna pendant un temps l'{mf|élu|élue} de son cœur dans ses voyages à travers les Étendues.

languages.text: Haciendo oídos sordos a los escandalosos rumores sobre su relación con el Comerciante Independiente, la lady Navegante Cassia siguió acompañando a su amado entre las estrellas de la Extensión durante un tiempo.
languages.original_text: Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

traits.locale_text: Haciendo oídos sordos a los escandalosos rumores sobre su relación con el Comerciante Independiente, la Lady Navegante Cassia acompañó a su amado entre las estrellas de la Extensión durante un tiempo.

languages.text: 自由開拓者との不倫という醜聞が取り沙汰されたにもかかわらず、カシア航宙士は引き続き、しばらくの間、恋人とともにエクスパンスの星々を巡ったという。
languages.original_text: Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者との不倫という醜聞が取り沙汰されたにもかかわらず、カシア航宙士は引き続き、しばらくの間、恋人とともにエクスパンスの星々を巡ったという。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'le ilişki yaşadığına dair skandal söylentilere rağmen Leydi Rotacı Cassia, Enginlik'teki yıldızlara yaptığı yolculuklarda âşığına eşlik etmeyi bir süre sürdürdü.
languages.original_text: Despite scandalous rumours about a love affair with the Rogue Trader, Lady Navigator Cassia continued to accompany her lover among the stars of the Expanse for a time.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'le ilişki yaşadığına dair skandal söylentilere rağmen Leydi Rotacı Cassia, Enginlik'teki yıldızlara yaptığı yolculuklarda âşığına eşlik etmeyi bir süre sürdürdü.
